title: Can I Touch Your Aura of Fortune? - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shoujo   Supernatural
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cute Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Godly Powers   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Mysterious Past   Naive Protagonist   Unlucky Protagonist
author: Chengnan hua kai   城南花开
description:
Lin Cha enjoyed all good luck in life before the age of sixteen. Her father was rich, her mother was a well-known pianist, her elder brother was a popular star and she was their little princess.

But after her sixteenth birthday, her life changed dramatically.

She choked on water, vomited anything she ate which cost more than ten yuan. There were Alipay malfunctions, the bank card password suddenly showed error as if God of Fortune was hostile to her.

The delicate little princess had to fight to survive.

Until one day, Lin Cha saw the famous school bully studying in her grade. Above his head were three big words in gold “God of fortune”

Lin Cha secretly observed him for a while and determined that this boy was really the God of Fortune hidden in the world. So she brought fruits and flowers to him, and seriously asked, ” Can I touch your  aura of fortune?”

Min Jingfeng: “…”

While staring at the aura of fortune, Lin Cha reluctantly handed flowers and fruits to him. “If not, maybe later.”

The god of fortune vs the soft sweet little princess>
